timeline.bodyText: Could you update the branch against master? I recently deleted this method as it was unused.
timeline.author: mfussenegger

replies.bodyText: Just wanted to make sure I see the full diff. But now I'm actually wondering if we could replace it with io.netty.handler.codec.http.QueryStringDecoder or so?
replies.author: mfussenegger

timeline.message: Add decode methods back to RestUtils
Add decode methods back to RestUtils

timeline.bodyText:
We also have a HttpTestServer that is based on netty. Maybe we could extend that so that the last channel handler is configurable and use that instead of adding another http-server variant?
Not sure if it is worth it, since this stuff here is part of the JDK anyway.
timeline.author: mfussenegger
